main: ^Good morning! Well I suppose it's just morning…
^Morning! What do you mean by that?
next: ^Yet again, some of our units didn’t return from battle last night
next2: ^I’m sorry to have to wake you up like this, but we need to kick this revolution into gear sooner rather than later
^We aren’t ready, we don't have the numbers or the strength to take on the royal family
next3: ^How many more of your friends need to be slaughtered before you wake up and realise that we need to fight!

next4: ^There will never be a ‘right time’ to start this. Come on, let’s get you trained up. We can discuss this on the way
